actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 58.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the House.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 106-114.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 48.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
Mr. Franks moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 460.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Cleared for White House.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 106-28.

official_title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse located at 401 South Michigan Street in South Bend, Indiana, as the "Robert K. Rodibaugh United States Bankruptcy Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse located at 401 South Michigan Street in South Bend, Indiana, as the Robert K. Rodibaugh United States Bankruptcy Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse located at 401 South Michigan Street in South Bend, Indiana, as the "Robert K. Rodibaugh United States Bankruptcy Courthouse".
